name: The Summit (Alex Smits, Panthaquest, Lekonia)
description:
The Summit is a first-person climbing game centered around a perilous journey up a mountain with a group of friends. 

- Hike, climb, and swing your way through a variety of platforming challenges. 

- Engage in the narrative to uncover why your friends are mysteriously disappearing. 

- Explore the frozen landscape and take photos of the scenery. 

This game was made in just five weeks as part of AIE's second year design course, Production for Clients.

https://aie.edu.au/

This story was inspired by a Short titled The Climb, written by JMF ScreenLabs.

https://jmfscreenlabs.com/
